items.label: Uranium Worker States
items.description: RECA covers certain uranium industry employment in the states of Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona, Wyoming, South Dakota, Washington, Utah, Idaho, North Dakota, Oregon, and Texas.

items.label: Downwinder Areas
items.description: RECA covers physical presence in certain counties located downwind from the Nevada Test Site in the states of Utah, Nevada, and Arizona.

items.label: Proposed RECA expansion areas
items.description: The failed amendment would have expanded RECA to the geographic downwinder eligibility to include then-residents of Idaho, Colorado, Montana, New Mexico and Guam.
